name: Internet Search
details: Do an internet search about the following topic: {Prompt}

details: Given the following researched topic, think of an app, and define its features: {Researched Topic}

name: LLM - Architecture
details: Create the architecture of the app based on the app features described, and the UI design provided, by listing down the classes that need to be defined, along with the fields and methods they have. Provide brief documentations/pseudocode as comments on each method as well for easy understanding of developers that will implement them.
